title: Skill Frontmatter
description: YAML frontmatter for SKILL.md files. Contains skill identity and optional runtime behavior.

description.description: Brief description of the skill's purpose
examples: React patterns and conventions for Claude agents

disable-model-invocation.description: Prevents AI model from invoking this skill

user-invocable.description: Users can invoke this skill directly

allowed-tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools this skill can use

model.description: AI model to use for this skill

agent.description: Agent name to use when skill is invoked

argument-hint.description: Hint for arguments when skill is invoked
